svcproc.title: LICENSE AGREEMENT

para.emph: AlliedSignal "ACOM FOR WINDOWS" END USER LICENSE AGREEMENT.

svcproc.para: AlliedSignal grants you a non-exclusive, non-transferable, license to use, for your internal purposes only, the Software, free of charge if you are (a) a customer of Allied- Signal Truck Brake Systems Company or (b) a customer of AlliedSignal Automotive Aftermarket, or (c) an employee of Allied-Signal.
